<Text: Bald Knob Cross, officially known as the Bald Knob Cross of Peace, is a large white cross located in Alto Pass, Illinois, United States.>

Text: Bald Knob Cross:  Originally completed in 1963, the cross itself stands 111 feet tall, is 22 feet square at the base, 16 feet square at the top and its arms extend 63 feet horizontally.
Triplets:<Bald Knob Cross
4:
--------------------
Text: Bald Knob Cross:  The exterior white panels covering the cross are 4-inch architectural flat insulated metal panels while the base portion is covered in granite approximately 4-inches thick.
Triplets:<Bald Knob Cross
5:
--------------------
Text: Bald Knob Cross:  The structure sits on a foundation of 730 tons of reinforced concrete that goes down 20 feet to bedrock.
